zheng-etal-2022-towards.title: Towards a Multi-Entity Aspect-Based Sentiment Analysis for Characterizing Directed Social Regard in Online Messaging
zheng-etal-2022-towards.author:
Zheng, Joan  and
Friedman, Scott  and
Schmer-galunder, Sonja  and
Magnusson, Ian  and
Wheelock, Ruta  and
Gottlieb, Jeremy  and
Gomez, Diana  and
Miller, Christopher
zheng-etal-2022-towards.paperMotivationText: Predicting the sentiment of a whole tweet is far too coarse to be useful for tasks like hate speech detection.
zheng-etal-2022-towards.paperContributionText: Dataset and model for predicting directed social regard as a multi-entity aspect-based sentiment analysis task.
zheng-etal-2022-towards.paperResultsText: Preliminary results for the prediction of DSR ratings in tweets.
zheng-etal-2022-towards.resourcesOtherText: Gab Hate Corpus (Kennedy et al. 2018),  How ISIS Uses Twitter dataset (Khuram, 2017), Manosphere community text posts (Ribeiro et al. 2020)
